# CAM::SET_ALLOW_CUSTOM_VEHICLE_DRIVE_BY_CAM_THIS_UPDATE

## Summary
Allows a custom vehicle drive-by camera, as specified in the vehicle layout metadata, to be used when aiming in a vehicle for this update only

## Parameters
* **BOOL** state
